name: glossiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being smooth and shiny: The gold ring reflected in the burnished glossiness of the wood. Baste the chicken regularly for bronze glossiness.
the quality of being attractive, but not having serious value or quality: I don't expect the film to be a history lesson but its glossiness is disappointing. They introduced a new glossiness to rock music. See
glossy
